name: TurboTax 2019 Tax Return File
summary: Learn about .TAX19 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: TurboTax is available as a downloadable desktop version for Windows and macOS, and as a web version called TurboTax Online. The software comes in Basic, Deluxe, Premier, and Home & Business editions with each edition providing different features at different prices.

instructions: You can open a TAX19 file with the desktop version of Intuit TurboTax (2019 or later), which is available for both Windows and macOS. To open a TAX19 file, select File → Open Tax Return.

You can also upload a TAX19 file to Intuit TurboTax Online when uploading your tax data from the previous year. For example, you can upload a TAX19 file to TurboTax Online when filing your taxes for the 2020 calendar year, but not the 2019 year. To open a TAX19 file with TurboTax Online, select Tax Tools → Tools, click "Transfer last year's TurboTax return from your computer," then follow the prompts to upload the file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
